snippet: The actress will play one of the richest female roles in New York theater this fall when the critically acclaimed British play about family alienation and the limits of loyalty comes to Off Broadway.
abstract: The actress will play one of the richest female roles in New York theater this fall when the critically acclaimed British play about family alienation and the limits of loyalty comes to Off Broadway.

headline.main: Mary McCann Nabs Plum Role in 'Harper Regan'
headline.print_headline: Mary McCann Will Star In ‘Harper Regan’
